ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:54:04 [Issue ID 4000-42596] urn:comicvine:4000-42596 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-20 03:41:50. [Issue ID 42596]
ComicInfo.Summary: Spawn freefalls through the levels of Hell where he he undergoes a physical and psychological baptism. Layers of Al Simmons' life are peeled away and his weaknesses are exposed. Finally, Malebolgia rips Al's heart out. Meanwhile, Terry's doctors are still puzzled by his miraculous recovery while Cyan refuses to give up a filthy shoelace she found at the hospital. Elsewhere, Sam shows Twitch their new '55 Chevy car.
ComicInfo.Title: Freefall
